definition: a strong desire to know or learn something
sentence: His curiosity about the universe led him to become an astronomer.

definition: very fine in texture or structure; fragile

definition: in accordance with the highest standards; faultless

definition: feeling or appearing casually calm and relaxed; not displaying anxiety
sentence: He walked into the meeting with a nonchalant attitude.

definition: a fictitious name, especially one used by an author
sentence: Samuel Clemens is better known by his pseudonym, Mark Twain.

definition: behaving or looking as though one thinks one is superior to others

definition: A deep, persistent sadness or gloom.

definition: Having an obstinately uncooperative attitude toward authority or discipline.
